category.title: Omelet
category.description:
All omelets are made with three farm fresh eggs and served with a choice of toast and hand-cut home fries or tossed salad. Substitute home fries for fruit salad $1.50 Egg whites are available for an additional of $2.00
Bread options: Whole Wheat, Scali, Rye. Gluten-free add $2.00, English muffin, Bagel $0.59

meals.title: Queens
meals.description: Slow roasted shredded pulled pork with peppers, onions, drizzled BBQ sauce and melted cheddar cheese.

meals.title: The Liberty
meals.description: Signature sausage, apple wood smoked bacon, diced ham, sautéed peppers and onion with melted American cheese.

meals.title: The Carnegie
meals.description: Filled with house made corned beef hash and melted cheddar cheese.

meals.title: Manhattan
meals.description: Our House-made chili and melted cheddar cheese, topped with sour cream.

note.title: Bread Options:
note.description: Whole wheat, Scali, White, Rye, Multi-grain, English muffin, Bagel $0.59, Glunten-free $2.00

meals.title: Brooklyn
meals.description: Pepper, onions, avocado, pepper jack cheese and topped with salsa.

meals.title: Central Park
meals.description: Broccoli, pepper, tomato, onion, spinach, asparagus, and Swiss cheese.

meals.title: Western Omelet
meals.description: Bell peppers, onions, ham, American cheese.

meals.title: Build Your Own Omelette
meals.description: Three eggs Omelette style with house toast and home fries or tossed salad.

options.title: Choose Veg ($0.99)
options.description: Tomato, Mushrooms, Asparagus, Broccoli, Spinach, Onions and Peppers

options.title: Choose Cheese ($0.99)
options.description: American, Cheddar, Feta, Swiss, Pepper Jack, Mozarella.

options.title: Choose Meat ($1.99)
options.description: Bacon, Ham, Sausage, Corn-beef Hash, Steak, Turkey, Smoked Salmon, Chicken.

category.title: Benedict
category.description: All New Yorker Benedict’s are made with farm fresh eggs and served with house made home fries or tossed salad. Substitute home fries for Fruit Salad $1.50

meals.title: 4th Avenue
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs served over our toasted English muffin with Smoked Salmon, and our lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: The Broadway
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs served over our toasted English muffin with Canadian bacon and topped with our lemon zest Hollandaise Sauce.

meals.title: Times Square
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs topped with shredded slow roasted BBQ pulled pork. Served over toasted English muffin and drizzled with our lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: Rockefeller Benny
meals.description: Two poached eggs on homemade corned beef hash served on a english muffin topped with our lemon zest Hollandaise Sauce.

meals.title: The Bronx
meals.description: Two poached eggs, baby spinach and thick sliced grilled fresh tomatoes served on an English muffin topped with our house made lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

category.title: Pancakes
category.description: All pancakes are served with maple syrup, whipped cream and butter. Add chocolate chips, pecans, banana, blueberry, strawberry, nutella, roasted coconut, ($1.25) each.

meals.title: Butter Milk
meals.description: A delicious full stack of butter milk pancakes. Short stack of two for $4.99 or a single for $2.99

meals.title: The Studio
meals.description: Pecans, blueberries, melted mascarpone cheese, topped with caramel sauce and yogurt.

meals.title: The New Yorker Potato Pancakes (Latkes)
meals.description: Crispy shredded potato pancakes with a bit of onion and spice. Served with  sour cream and applesauce.
